t: Amazon.com: Customer reviews: Funtime FT825CR Antique Carnival-Style 8-Ounce Tabletop Hot-Oil Popcorn Popper, Red
s: The machine is easy to clean. I was using the Funtime 3 in 1 bags, which made great popcorn, but I've since switched to making my own batches. I use 1/3 cup coconut oil to 1 to 1 1/4 cups kernels. I add about 3/4 teaspoons of Flavacol Brand salt by Gold Medal (32 oz.
